original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 305.40/60 against the US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 305.40/60 against the US dollar in the spot market on Monday, dealers said while bonds yields were steady.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 26.40/60 percent steady from 26.40/55 percent, at Friday’s close.
The rupee closed at 305.40/60 against the US dollar in the spot market stronger from 306.50/307.20 on Friday. (Colombo/May22/2023)
